historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For Law 13-140, see notes following ยง 26-1001.

DC CODE ยง 26-1021

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: Any person who violates any provision of this chapter, any rule or regulation or order issued or promulgated pursuant to this chapter, or any order of the Superintendent directed to that person, shall be liable for a penalty of not more than $1,000 for each violation.
The Corporation Counsel may bring proceedings to recover all amounts due to the District under this section.

The Superintendent, in the exercise of his reasonable judgment, is authorized to compromise, settle, and collect civil penalties with or from any person for violations of any provision of this chapter, or of any rule, regulation or order issued or promulgated pursuant to this chapter.

title.text: Banks and Other Financial Institutions. (Refs & Annos)
